title: Afonso da Ilha (Fr.)
body: With this name, there was a religious member of the Franciscan order, a native of this island, who was a respected writer of his time. In 1543, he published a book entitled 'Tesouro da Virtude', which was translated into Italian.

Afonso da Ilha: Religious member of the Franciscan order

1543: Publication of the book 'Tesouro da Virtude'
